pkgmetadata.longdescription: Micro-Macro Analysis for Social Networks // Estimates micro effects on macro structures (MEMS) and average micro mediated effects (AMME) when using statistical models for network structure. URL: https://github.com/sduxbury/netmediate. BugReports: https://github.com/sduxbury/netmediate/issues. Long, J. Scott, and Sarah Mustillo (2018) doi:10.1177/0049124118799374. Mize, Trenton D. (2019) doi:10.15195/v6.a4. Imai, Kosuke (2010) doi:10.1037/a0020761. Imai, Kosuke (2010) doi:10.1214/10-STS321.
